segments.text: Hello . I'd like to get a seat to New York City on a flight leaving sometime before this Friday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid Thera isn't any direct light before Friday . What about a non-direct one ? You have to make a change in Detroit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , in that case , that's fine . I want a first class ticket on Thursday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like to pay in cash or by card ?
segments.speaker: S2
